The capital of the region is Goz Beïda. == Subdivisions == Sila is divided into two departments: Department Capital Sub-prefectures Djourf Al Ahmar Am Dam Am Dam, Magrane, Haouich Kimiti Goz Beïda Goz Beïda, Koukou-Angarana, Tissi, Adé, Mogororo, Kerfi, Moudeïna == References == Category:2008 establishments in Africa Category:Regions of Chad
title: Sila Region
